text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A few days later, it's time for the<n>Tracen Meet, an internal
event<n>designed to give students an<n>opportunity to push
their limits. This<n>time, the competition seems even<n>more
heated than usual.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
It's a runaway Maruzensky, with<n>Symboli Rudolf on the
chase! Will it be<n>a dead heat between these two?<n>They're
leaving the pack behind!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: How lucky are we to be seeing ashow like this at school? Oh,they're on the final corner!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky & Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hahhh!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
I-incredible! Simply incredible! Can the<n>Emperor catch up?
Will the Hot Rod<n>run away with it?! They're down to<n>the
last 100 meters in this battle of the<n>century!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Seeing Sakura Chiyono O leave the<n>stands with a grimace
on her face, I<n>find myself wanting to follow.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: When I finally find her, she's<n>absolutely soaked.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Oh! T-Trainer! I, um, I'm fine! I wasjust feeling a little bleh, so Isplashed myself with some water!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Yeah, or more like... meh? Or "hnghh"?You know, when your heart and headare all like whoo...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: That sort of... feeling...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
...Sorry. To be honest, there's nothing<n>cutesy about how I
feel.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
The race was amazing. It felt every bit<n>as exciting as a G1.
The crowd all held<n>their breath, overwhelmed by the<n>
spectacle...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Watching a race like that, I... I felt like...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: I could never stand shoulder to<n>shoulder with them.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
S-something like that, anyway!<n>Ahaha! Sorry, I'm not
making any<n>sense!
choice_data_list: You don't know until you try.
You don't know until you try.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: I'm... not sure about that.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Th-the thing is, ever since the day I<n>was captivated by
Maruzen, I started<n>doing everything I possibly could.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
I-I felt like I was growing, and my<n>times did actually improve.
My form<n>even got compliments from my<n>instructor...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
It wasn't much, but I was getting<n>closer—closer to her! I
really believed<n>that, but...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
After all that hard work, all that<n>improvement, I realized
something!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: ...We're still worlds apart.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She whips the letter from earlier out<n>of her pocket and tears
it to shreds.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Pant... pant...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Ah... S-sorry! I, um... I need to go!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She picks up the shreds one by one<n>and tosses them into
the trash can,<n>then runs off before I can stop her.

text_block_list.name: Letter
text_block_list.text:
If I could one day run alongside you in<n>front of thousands, it
would be a<n>dream come true.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I catch a glimpse of her letter, written<n>in large, neat, but
shaky letters.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Over the next few days, I can't stop<n>worrying about Sakura
Chiyono O, but<n>I struggle to figure out the best way to<n>
approach her.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
You wanted to talk about Chiyo?<n>What's this all about,
Rudolf?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
You must already be aware, but...<n>ever since our scrimmage
race, she's<n>been feeling down. Hishi Amazon<n>alerted me
to this.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I kept tabs on her for a few days, and<n>it seemed her mind
was elsewhere.<n>Her face looked sickly too.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Adulation and despair are two sides<n>of the same coin. Many
leave the<n>academy in tears over broken<n>dreams... "I'll
never catch up to you."<n>I've heard those words countless<n>
times.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: As have you, I imagine.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: ...Heh. Ever the worrywart, aren't<n>you?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
It's true that she might not be the<n>most gifted. But she
knows that.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
That's why she's out on the track<n>every morning,
monitoring her<n>condition, racking her brain over how<n>she
can improve.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
What I mean is, she stares her<n>weaknesses in the eye
every single<n>day. It takes a strong heart to do<n>that... So
she'll be just fine.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She has a point. Coming to terms with<n>your own
weaknesses sounds easy,<n>but surprisingly few can do it.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure some of that tenacity stems<n>from Chiyono O's
own personality,<n>but the biggest factor must be...

text_block_list.name: Letter
text_block_list.text:
If I could one day run alongside you in<n>front of thousands, it
would be a<n>dream come true.
choice_data_list: (She has Maruzensky to look up to.)

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
She's just not quite ready to take the<n>dive and get hurt yet.
Once she is,<n>she'll be on our heels in no time.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: ...I see. Forgive my ignorance, then.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Sakura Chiyono O might bend, but she<n>won't break. With
just a little more<n>courage, she'll be back on her feet<n>
running with a smile.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Before I know it, I'm dashing down<n>the stairs and off
looking for her.
